reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Finnpartnership: Feasibility study related to establishment of research development and training centre in Tansania

description.narrative: It will be carried out in the project all necessary studies for launching the research development and training center in Tanzania as Finnish-Tanzanian cooperation. Activities include;? WP1: Completing the consortium and drafting the contracts- Selection o f best available Tanzanian partners for RDI and Training Center. - Completion of the existing Finnish consortium (JGV Partners) to achieve as strong knowledge capacity as possible.? ? WP3: Identification of potential RDI projects (energy / logistics)- For the RDI and Training Centre it will be identified 10 most viable projects that could be started to implement in cooperation with African partners. In the project planning we create projects which benefit both countries Finland and Tansania still the specia l focus is in development in Tansania.- Also in this case it will be concentrated on energy and logistics projects? WP4: Preparing the Business Plan - On the basis of studies made in previous work packages it will be prepared the business plan for the RDI- and Training Center so that the Centre's operation can be profitable started with the lowest possible risk. The business plan studies all the expenses that should be covered by the revenues as well as by what kind of pricing model of products and services expenses can be covered. The business plan creates the base for economic launching of the center.
